name: The day before the harvest 🍃✨
description:
TOMORROW, THE HARVEST BEGINS!
LAST CHANCE TO CHILL.

It's the end of summer. Discover the lovely little corner of nature where you have chosen to spend a last day of rest before the harvest season begins.

"The Day Before The Harvest" is a relaxing game that invites you to explore a small map with many secrets to "harvest". Will you be able to complete your journal before the end of the day?

Put on a headset and grab your controller!

The game is best played on desktop with your keyboard ⌨️ or a gamepad 🎮
Mobile is unfortunately not currently supported.

Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 52 by a team of onepoint experts.
